item.title: Help this poor SCAR noob :(
item.dc:creator: @emodude emodude
item.description:
@emodude wrote:

ok go into the includes folder then youll have to make a new folder named srl then copy all the contents into that srl folder now if the zip folder or rar folder or whatever u got it in if it already ahs that srl folder with everything in it just copy it into the includes folder hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Help this poor SCAR noob :(
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Don’t put it in you includes folder. Make a new folder in the includes folder and put that stuff in there.
